Title:
Towards a revision of the genus Orthosia Decne. (Apocynaceae:
Asclepiadoideae: Asclepiadeae)
Journal: Annals of the Missouri Botanical Gard
Abstract:
A revision of the genus Orthosia is provided, comprising
50 species, 35 in South America, 14 Central America, one in the
Caribbean. All species are described and illustrated.
